TopicTitle: [1.3.X] Lionhead Aerospace landers and probes pack continued v2.0

Articles.Content:
Thread maintained by me

Addon maintained by MeCripp.

Use the provided .craft files instead of building it.

Hello all. This is the fixed version of Lionhead's Landers and Probes pack.

Credit to MeCripp for fixing this.

Currently includes:

-Thor pole explorer

-Valkriye

-kerbnik

Hermes

-Atlas

 

https://www.dropbox.com/s/qmy4u41ptq2qjm1/Lionhead_Aerospace_Inc_v1.42.zip?dl=0

Pictures:

https://gyazo.com/138891e1af436556dbbf2f6ed85bfd50'

 

 

 

Original thread:

 

 

Written permission granted from yogui87 to distribute.

Edited October 21, 2017 by Jhorriga
Pics?  Or at least a link to the original thread.

While it is early in the revamp, if you also work it out with some other modders to have  MM patches  to integrate the parts into Community Tech Tree, SETI Tech tree, RealChutes for any chutes and DMagic Science Configs  it may increase the number of players who will DL.  BARIS is also gaining popularity.
Ok. Thanks!

Thanks for adding the link.  Looking forward to seeing it as you proceed.

Feel free to ask for help.

Update: I figured out the problem with the parachutes. They caused way too much drag, resulting in the craft moving sideways rather than descending. I'm going to match the parameters with the stock drogue chutes.
Alright. Valkriye (viking) Is done. Expect to see it in the next release along with some tweaks.

Good news! DSL Pandora (curiosity) is coming to this mod! And, if someone can provide me a download link, I may be able to squeeze in the Prometheus (Mars exploration rover or Spirit) Aswell.

Expect next release today. It will Include Valkriye.

you should get in touch with @MeCripp he knows about this mod a lot, if i can help just pm me ,thou i have been out of the loop since Ksp 1.2.2 so i am just starting back again in 1.3.1

anyway great to see someone picking up this mod!

Alrighty. Thanks.

I need some help with Pandora's wheels.

They are part of the base of the rover, and the game recognizes them as an animation (since they deploy down) Instead of wheels. I need help with this. 

Im also fixing the skycrane animation and rigging it to an action group in the craft file.
V.2.0 Released! Now Includes Valkryie aswell as a few fixes.
I think you still haven't placed antenna configs on both the probes.

@Jhorigga I have a list of problems here.....

1. The chutes, when deployed, and the heatshield, still attached to the Aeroshell (on both Phoenix and Viking) cause a very bad vibration until the heatshield is jetted.

This vibration is bad enough to destroy Phoenix's solar panels.

2. a. The Viking orbiter, does not have a Solar Panel config, causing the end user to fix the old config with something

     b. Once the you leave the Viking orbiter with the panels deployed, and come back to it after leaving it on rails, the solar panels are still detected, but can not be deployed (may be from my configs)

     c. The Viking orbiter's solar panels does not give any power output at all, even while unobstructed. (may be from my configs)

may add a couple more by morning. high school is tiring enough and I'm here late in the night.
problems are gonna be fixed.
